briefdescription.para: Initialize all hardware on the board.

simplesect.para: CY_RSLT_SUCCESS if the board is successfully initialized, if there is a problem initializing any hardware it returns an error code specific to the hardware module that had a problem.

briefdescription.para: Description: Provides initialization code for starting up the hardware contained on the Infineon board.
